Text: Thank u so much for all of these classic films frankie-boy. With any luck, younger audiences will get a chance to enjoy these great films instead of killing their brain cells with the latest American Pie or Final Destination sequel. Keep up the great work!

Thank you BoyoBoss, for your comments and encouragement. I too feel that the best film noirs, especially of the late forties and early fifties, offer a richness and power that most modern films don't match.

Also thanks to the seeders!

I never even knew there were so many film noirs made. Even a search on IMDB didn't turn up a fraction of these. 

Great stuff - thank you so much. I will seed as much as I can.

ex_pat3, that is why I tagged all of my noir uploads with "film noir", so people could find them.

Unfortunately, I can't enforce that tagging on others who upload noirs, so I try to reference and link those uploads in my comments.

Thanks for your comments, ex_pat3, and for supporting this by offering to seed AMAP. I really appreciate it!
Great finds of these noir gems!
Reseed by uploader completed December 2011. Please seed.
